column5: Kookum took her dancin at the big grassy pow wow. Regalia looks awesome?  Wish I coulda been there but im still laid up with an infection in my foot?    With kokum

Is kokum Mom Rick? They both look gorgeous. It must be like an Italian Roman Catholic having their First Holy Communion. It used to be big deal in our family. Now no one knows what religion the kids are, if any. I remember my niece saying when they were little "we aren't part Italian Mom, we don't have a kitchen in our basement".  You must be sad you missed it Rick, you will have another chance soon. What's with the foot?

Kookum is grandma OI  Yeah im bummed i missed it but i get to see her dance tomorrow?  She even won a spot dance award tonight?  Im so hyped to go watch her dance tomorrow its gonna probably make me cry lol.  Although im ukranian, italian, german, and norwegian. I love the aboriginal aspect of my better half and our children! Such a respectful heritage(not that the others arent as well)  Ive been out with a staph infection in my foot near my big toe. Been about 8 days of pure hell. Horrible. But its getting better?  And heres a pic of my better half just so ya know lol    Shed kill me if she knew i posted a photo of her lol

And it is a communion of sorts.  I dont know how to explain it?  Its almost like military pride.  The elders accept you( even though we are a blended family)  But they cry, show soooo much respect to see the traditions carried on. Its just a huge honour.  Makes me very very proud?  At one with the earth as they say.  Its healing, very emotional. The dances are beautiful and all thats good in this world
awesome thanks for posting, getting close with the creater and mother earth, love the dancing and drummin
She's a cutie! You must be proud.
Now I know why I like you kiddo, Italiano figlio mio. II didn't mean your daughters Mom, I meant your Mother. I thought she was coming this summer to stay with you.
That's cool..grew up around the Rez ..been to a few pow wows very powerful experience
Love looking a kids photos in different cultural outfits, She is cute, and you must be a proud father .

Lol. Yeah my mom just got here last sunday or so, its been a blur. Hadnt seen her for years.  Good times?  Shes 100% italian. My belly is full lol. She cooks like 6 times a day hahah. Im not even outta bed yet and I can smell tomatoe something cooking haha
Awesome pics  That's a one a spicy meat ball LOL!

Yep! We hit the powows every year! Its always awesome!  My personal favorites are the traditional powows but those are becoming rare. Lots are all just dance specials now.  My wife couldnt go because she is pregnant. Thats a nono. If you dance or attend a pow wow pregnant your offering your child to the creator
Always is! Especially the healing songs!!!
Beavertail, stonefish  Absolutely!!!  And lol Joey???
Very nice Rick.  Enjoy todays dancing
My youngest boy getting down!    Will do Brian!  Perfect weather today too, nice and cool?
